Complex Mixtures/Biological Products/Vaccines/Viral Vaccines/Poliovirus Vaccines/Poliovirus Vaccine, Inactivated
Record.Description: A suspension of formalin-inactivated poliovirus grown in monkey kidney cell tissue culture and used to prevent POLIOMYELITIS.
